name: Ext_R5_DetectedIssue_author
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DetectedIssue.author for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DetectedIssue.author from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DetectedIssue|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: The provider or device that identified the issue
element.definition: Individual or device responsible for the issue being raised.  For example, a decision support application or a pharmacist conducting a medication review.
element.comment: `DetectedIssue.author` maps to R4 `DetectedIssue.author`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
